1.13 pasugiya kalaye di wishala washayen athi wu dushana chodana pilibanda pariksha kirima sandaha wishesha komishan sabha path kirima swadhina komishan sabha sthapitha kirima saha ee sandaha awashya pathwim kirima, jathika wiganana panatha saha thorathuru dana ganime ayithiya pilibanda panatha handunwa dima, jathika aushadha prathipaththiya handunwa dima, widhayaka janadhipathi kramaya wenuwata parlimenthu kramaya athi kirima yana karunu mema wadasatahan yatathe api janathawata dun porondu athara pradhana karunu we.
